participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and sensitive; she has a deep love for animals and values emotional connections.
participant_1.background: Leaving my hometown to pursue my dreams. I was sad when my cat died last year. My father was a driver himself. I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts. I volunteer at the local humane society.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and creative; he enjoys helping others express themselves and has a laid-back approach to life.
participant_2.background: One of my hobbies is to help people feel their best by dressing them up. I enjoy walking and hiking as my favorite sports because they are both low-impact and can be done in a variety of settings. I plan to relax on the weekend and not think too much. I am a guitar player. I don’t have a relationship with my deadbeat dad.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big animal lover. I volunteer at the local humane society. What do you like to do in your spare time?
I love walking and hiking as my favorite sports because they are both low-impact and can be done in a variety of settings.
That's great! I also love to hike. Do you have any pets?
I had a cat named Mittens but he died last year. I'm still sad about him.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure he was a great cat. I have a dog named Buddy. He's a Golden Retriever.
Golden Retrievers are so cute! I love dogs.
They're the best! What kind of music do you like?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite is country.
That's great! I love country music too. Who's your favorite artist?
I love Garth Brooks, Kenny Chesney, and Carrie Underwood.
Those are all great artists! I love their music too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and watch movies.
That's great! I love to go to concerts too. I'm not much of a gamer, but I do like to watch movies.
What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Notebook.
That's a great movie! I love the story.
Me too! It's so romantic.
I know! It's one of my favorites.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too
